## Biography
Margaret (Meg) Ellingwood is a third-year student in the PhD program in statistics at CMU. She graduated from Kenyon College and briefly taught high school statistics before entering graduate school. Meg participated in CMSACamp Summer 2020 and is very excited to be involved again this year. She is interested in applications of statistics and data science in sports, public health, and neuroscience.
